parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
And, both. A primary particle of connection or addition; both or also.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
To invite, encourage along with others; pass: I share in encouragement with. From sun and parakaleo; to console jointly.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Reciprocal Pronoun - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: One another, each other. Genitive plural from allos reduplicated; one another.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
